record.description: Groundbreaking ceremony for the University of Chicago's Oriental Institute. [University president Robert Maynard Hutchins (center left) looks on as Dr. James H. Breasted (center right) uses a shovel to break ground].
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
